name: Space Ships
description:
Take to space with your friends in your very own pirate ship, and destroy all opposition in this space-arena shooter. (This game has missing features that are not present in its current pre-alpha state.)

The game is still in active development, and as such, the current selection of screenshots do not represent the final design of the game(Screenshots may not also represent current features available).

The demo will be available as a free demo to catch bugs of the core mechanics as the final base mechanics are finished and implemented.

Currently set up to use the Steam subsystem for searching for servers, so you will need to be logged into Steam
